statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT drug_name, dosage_amount, trial_result FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, dosage_amount, patient_id, trial_date, trial_result FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, trial_result FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT trial_date, dosage_amount FROM clinical_trial_data ORDER BY trial_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, trial_result, dosage_amount FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY trial_date DESC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND trial_result = 'Positive'
SELECT MAX(dosage_amount) as max_dosage, MIN(dosage_amount) as min_dosage FROM clinical_trial_data
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, trial_date FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_result = 'Negative' ORDER BY trial_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) as num_trials FROM clinical_trial_data GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY num_trials DESC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, dosage FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE efficacy_score > 0.5;
SELECT algorithm_name, model_filename FROM machine_learning_algorithm;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, efficacy_score, dosage FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE drug_id = 3 AND efficacy_score < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, dosage FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(efficacy_score) AS max_score, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE drug_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data ct INNER JOIN machine_learning_algorithm ml ON ct.drug_id = ml.algorithm_id WHERE ml.algorithm_name = 'Random Forest';

SELECT trial_id, patient_id, efficacy_score FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinical_trial_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 AND weight <= 70;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type, drug_company FROM drug_metadata WHERE drug_type = 'Antibiotic';
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, weight FROM patient_data ORDER BY age ASC, weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE efficacy_score > 0.5 ORDER BY trial_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM clinical_trials WHERE drug_name = 'Drug A';
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type, drug_company FROM drug_metadata WHERE drug_type = 'Antibiotic';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30);
SELECT * FROM trials;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, dosage, trial_date, outcome FROM trials;
SELECT trial_id, drug_name, dosage FROM trials WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage, outcome FROM trials WHERE trial_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT trial_id, patient_id, effectiveness FROM results WHERE effectiveness >= 0.8 AND cost < 500 ORDER BY effectiveness DESC;
SELECT * FROM trials JOIN results ON trials.trial_id = results.trial_id WHERE trials.outcome = 'Successful' AND results.effectiveness > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drug_information WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM patient_details WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT outcome, age, gender FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE trial_id = 10;
SELECT prediction_id, efficacy_score, prediction_date FROM efficacy_prediction ORDER BY prediction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trial_data WHERE age >= 50 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, dosage FROM drug_information WHERE side_effects LIKE '%headache%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address, contact_number FROM patient_details WHERE LENGTH(contact_number) = 10;
SELECT prediction_id, efficacy_score FROM efficacy_prediction WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT result_id, accuracy, model_name FROM machine_learning_results ORDER BY accuracy DESC, model_name ASC;
